document.title: Frequently Asked Questions: Contribute to Cayenne

subsection.name: Q 6.1 What are the licensing terms for accepted contributions?
subsection.p: One of the conditions of accepting third-party contributions to Cayenne is that they are released under Cayenne license. Code and documentation should contain author credits and copyright notes.

subsection.name: Q 6.2 I've fixed a few things in Cayenne. How do I submit a patch?
subsection.p: Patches should be submitted via Cayenne Issue Tracker. A patch will be applied if there is a "lazy" consensus among committers. For instructions on how to make a patch follow this link.
